Package it.unicam.cs.pa.robot

Class BasicRobot

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.pa.robot.BasicRobot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Robot, RobotLoopManagement, RobotMovementManagement
public class BasicRobot extends Object implements Robot
A basic implementation representing a robot in the swarm.
